title: National Lampoon's Animal House
description: When they arrive at college, socially inept freshmen Larry (Tom Hulce) and Kent (Stephen Furst) attempt to pledge the snooty Omega Theta Pi House, but are summarily rejected. Lowering their standards, they try at the notoriously rowdy Delta Tau Chi House, and get in. The trouble is, the college dean (John Vernon) has it in for the Deltas. He has put them on "Double Secret Probation" and secretly assigned Omega's president (James Daughton) the task of having their charter revoked.
summary: Bluto (John Belushi), Otter and the Deltas run wild at 1962 Faber College.
